user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose deal schedule create --allowed-piece-cid-file '/tmp/TestScheduleCreateHandler3726646907/001/cid.txt' --allowed-piece-cid bafkreie7q3iidccmpvszul7kudcvvuavuo7u6gzlbobczuk5nqk3b4akba 5 provider
